name: David Ramirez
text: Yes, I know licensing makes it impossible, but I wish every video game would let players substitute soundtracks from other games. It would be a trip to play Saints Row 4 while listening to Zelda. Actually, I guess I just want the perfect audio library of everything...     Also, Lindsey Stirling time!     https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b3KUyPKbR7Q
